item.title: Tropical Depression ISABEL Forecast/Advisory Number 54
item.description:
Issued at 1500Z FRI SEP 19 2003 
ZCZC MIATCMAT3 ALL
TTAA00 KNHC DDHHMM
TROPICAL DEPRESSION ISABEL FORECAST/ADVISORY NUMBER  54
NWS TPC/NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER MIAMI FL   AL132003
1500Z FRI SEP 19 2003
 
AT 11 AM EDT...1500Z...ALL COASTAL TROPICAL STORM WARNINGS HAVE BEEN
DISCONTINUED.  HOWEVER...STORM SURGE FLOODING IS STILL OCCURRING IN
MANY AREAS.  PLEASE CONSULT STATEMENTS ISSUED BY YOUR LOCAL
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE FORECAST OFFICE FOR INFORMATION CONCERNING
HAZARDOUS CONDITIONS IN YOUR AREA.
 
TROPICAL DEPRESSION CENTER LOCATED NEAR 42.0N  80.7W AT 19/1500Z
POSITION ACCURATE WITHIN  45 NM
 
PRESENT MOVEMENT TOWARD THE NORTH OR 350 DEGREES AT  26 KT
 
ESTIMATED MINIMUM CENTRAL PRESSURE  997 MB
MAX SUSTAINED WINDS  30 KT WITH GUSTS TO  40 KT.
WINDS AND SEAS VARY GREATLY IN EACH QUADRANT.  RADII IN NAUTICAL
MILES ARE THE LARGEST RADII EXPECTED ANYWHERE IN THAT QUADRANT.
 
REPEAT...CENTER LOCATED NEAR 42.0N  80.7W AT 19/1500Z
AT 19/1200Z CENTER WAS LOCATED NEAR 40.9N  80.4W
 
FORECAST VALID 20/0000Z 47.0N  80.5W...EXTRATROPICAL
MAX WIND  35 KT...GUSTS  45 KT.
34 KT...350NE   0SE   0SW 350NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 20/1200Z 54.0N  79.0W...EXTRATROPICAL
MAX WIND  35 KT...GUSTS  45 KT.
34 KT...450NE   0SE   0SW 450NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 21/0000Z 60.0N  77.0W...EXTRATROPICAL
MAX WIND  35 KT...GUSTS  45 KT.
34 KT...500NE   0SE 500SW 500NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 21/1200Z...MERGED WITH EXTRATROPICAL LOW
 
THIS IS THE LAST FORECAST/ADVISORY ISSUED BY THE
NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER ON THIS SYSTEM
 
FORECASTER FRANKLIN
item.author: jason.fleming@seahorsecoastal.com
